title: Android record so how's to save transcript to file system?
content: I want to export my transcript from google record app.  I select, share transcript, but cannot save to a place where I can copy to my pc.  There are a bunch of apps in the share area but not all of my apps.  In particular, not the file explore app.  From android file transfer I can not find the files either.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
